titleInfo.title: Multilingual Question Answering over Linked Data: QALD-3 Dataset

mods.abstract: This dataset comprises 200 natural language questions over DBpedia 3.8, annotated with SPARQL queries and answers. It was part of the QALD-3 open challenge: questions 1-100 constitute the training question set and questions 101-200 constitute the test question set.
